values:
In the year 2006 I resolve to:
Bring back disco.

Get your resolution here

1.What did you do in 2005 that you'd never done before?
  jumped 2' 6'' on Avatar!, high school field hockey

2.Did you keep your new year's resolutions, and will you make more for next year?
  I didn't have any

3. Did anyone close to you give birth?
nope

4. Did anyone close to you die?
Mary

5. What countries did you visit?
none

6. What would you like to have in 2006 that you lacked in 2005?
rupert

7. What date from 2005 will remain etched upon your memory, and why?
NESBA finals, my first red sox game, green day concert...

8. What was your biggest achievement of the year?
not sucking at field hockey

9. What was your biggest failure?
geometry. fuck.

10. Did you suffer illness or injury?
my knee was annoying the entire fh season...thats about it

11. What was the best thing you bought?
DKNY sweater, im in love with it and i bought it by myself =] hehe

12. Whose behavior merited celebration?
um?

13. Whose behavior made you appalled and depressed?
my being able to obsess over everything

14. Where did most of your money go?
myself. whoops.

15. What did you get really excited about?
field hockey, green day concert!, red sox games

16. What song will always remind you of 2005?
ummmm?

17. Compared to this time last year, are you happier or sadder?
much happier =] thank the lordd

18. What do you wish you'd done more of?
more camp, more not being shy, more field hockeyness

19. What do you wish you'd done less of?
less obsessing over everything

20. How will you be spending Christmas?
already..spent..it

21. Did you fall in love in 2005?
not exactly.

24. What was your favorite TV program?
Will & Grace

25. Do you hate anyone now that you didn't hate this time last year?
actually, yes.

26. What was the best book you read?
harry potter and the half blood prince. absolutely. amazing.

27. What was your greatest musical discovery?
the producers. duh. lol

28. What did you want and get?
i wanted a good birthday, and oh man did i get one<3 

29. What did you want and not get?
rupert, rupert, rupert, rupe..andddd....well, rupert.

30. What was your favorite film of this year?
HARRY POTTER & THE GOBLET OF FIRE

31. What did you do on your birthday?
A freaking surprise party!!!!!!! Which i loved and will never forget

32. What one thing would have made your year immeasurably more satisfying?
metting and dating RUPERT

33. How would you describe your personal fashion concept in 2005?
changed. sort of scrubish one day and then whatever else another 

34. What kept you sane?
my friends<3 and the thought of rupert

35. Which celebrity/public figure did you fancy the most?
Rupert. Emma. Johnny Damon.

36. What political issue stirred you the most?
Ally week<3

37. Who do you miss?
brennen.

38. Who was the best new person you met?
uhhhh?

39. Tell us a valuable life lesson you learned in 2005.
dont make everything about yourself, make it so you can help others

40. Quote a song lyric that sums up your year.
"Dont let anyone tell you your life is over, be every color that you are"
sort of?

I dont really know what sparked this, but i think im going to write a HP book 7 prediction. I warn you though, if you havnt read The Half Blood Prince yet, You may not want ot read this. It may be a spolier, im not sure yet.

Anywyas.

Well obviously ron & hermione were getting into eachother, the whole jealousy thing was amazing in the 7th. I just wanted them to "snog" already. So yeah, I think they will have the same relationship tension going on throughout most of the book and then ron will maracurously save hermione from something incredible and deadly. Or, maybe a twist, hermione well save ron, which actually is more probably because of the nature of the characters. At the end of the book i think they will deifnately say something that will lead us to believe they'll get married and so on. 

Then again, it could be completely opposite, and harmione and ron will end up hating eachother. But i also think the only possilbe way they won't end up together is if they originally get together and then somehting happens.

Okay, onto the plot of the story. You know the whole horcrux deal, without them, voldemort is absolutely nothing. I think that harry and the gang will return to school, and then leave without notice somtime during he year after an uprising in some dark side news. They'll go out to try and find and destroy all the horcruxes. Then they will go on some struggling and heroic journey, the typical thing, and then they'll destroy all but one. It will some down to harry and voldemort, face to face, no one else. They'll do that cute battle thing they did in GoF and all the heart-warming dead people surroundding harry situation will occur, andmy deseaced lover will be there, Albus. And YES, i truly beleive he is dead and will not rise again. I beleive that when harry sees dumbledore again, he will realize the he himself is the final horcrux(voldemort rested his power in him back in the day when the scar originated). He'll have to kill himself and voldemort, i know, i tear jerking end. Ron and Hermione will show up right before he kills both himself and voldey.

And so ends the series. 

Feedback and opions are welcome on the comment page =]

Who got new winter riding boots and an amazing mp3 player? Shelley did!

And who slipped on ice and fell into a pile of shit because a horse pushed her? Shelley did!


Still in an amazing mood

You see, Geometry and I have a perfect relationship going on. I try to avoid it, it tries to avoid me. I hate it, it hates me. i earn a 31 average, it gives me a 31 average. We know our differences and accept them just fine. Why tamper with a relationship in fine working order? And the fact that i need to see someone do the problem 1982 times before i can understnad it or even frickin attempt it, keeps geometry and i pretty spaced.

This kid in my class thinks everyone is racist. It annoys me. He doesnt get his way and his first reaction is "Man, why you got to be so racist, yo?!" And the other kid thinks everything that happens to him has to do with the fact that he's cape verdian. i know i spelt that worng. "yo, It I cant do that" why? "Cause' Im cape verde, homes!" SHUT. UP.

Movie night wednesday with my SJCC girlies...and nick.. im pretty pumped

Im sorry ladies and gentlemen, but JOHNNY IS STAYING. or at least i keep telling myself that. i started to cry in school today. All my boys, GONE. gone gone goen gone gone. this isnt happening BABY STAY WITH UP. Just go to the Dallas meeting this winter, please please please. The sox want you, and you'll look really bad in pinstripes anyways<3 Please do this for me baby

Listen, i mess up sometimes, im not perfect. i NEVER know the right things to say, and i NEVER make sense. Sorry.

SORRY SORRY SORRY SORRY! IM <font size=5>SORRY</font>

clear enough? I sure as hell hope so. You'll move on, you now know that shelley can sometimes be a bitch & really cant tell what to do a lot of the time. Let me make this clear to you aswell?

<font size=5> I CANT BE A BITCH AND I KNOW IT! I TRY NOT TO BE BUT HLAKJHSLKAJHS</font>

So dont go and talk trash about me, the person who told you OBVIOUSLY didnt give you the WHOLE story. Why not come and talk to me if somethigns going on, i honestly won't mind, i'll think its awesome that oyu can actually talk to me without just getting information from someone who doesnt know what going on. You said it oyourself, you hate rumors & such.

KJALKHASKJHALKJSHS

What do you do when your sickly obsessed, when you need something so badly, you would die to get it

in love with a movie star

i need help.
I've decided to make my mission in life be to find this dress, and wear it all the time

<u>10 Reason To Date A Horseback Rider</u>
10.we can ride in many different positions
9.we're used to having things's between our legs
8.we can mount with ease
7.if we fall off we get back on and ride harder
6.we always know how fast or slow to go
5.we can always find the right spot
4.we're used to rough riding and whips
3.we can go the distance
2.we control with hips, hands, and legs
1.we KNOW how to ride

I laughed for quite a while. yeah.

Once upon a time there was a team of field hockey players. All of these girls worked very hard and worked their butts off under King Galvan's rule. They learned all sorts of things like dodging the players yonder, and working with thy stick. And dribbling, they learned lots and lots of dribbling because if they just hit thy ball with thy stick right to opposing players, King Galvan would say "Off with their heads!" and they did not want that. This team of mere serfs worked up to the last outdoor game and played wonderfully. Then the season ended. King Galvan sold his team to Lord Jessica Nutting. The girls played at Bridgewater Sports Complex Castle because even though the outdoor season was over, there love of the sport called them to the indoor field. The stupid one on the team ate a donut before she arrived and it was really good and made her very happy until she almost threw it back up onto her awesome goalie girlfriend. The girls "had no purpose" and had trouble "defending the territory" adn clearly, their feet had not been fixed. Then the team played forgot absolutely everything they learned and worked at and kind of sucked, but they still won and lived happily ever after. The end.

I decidied to rant slash love my classes in journal form. By the way, I'm not procrastinating my homework. Actually, I am. Sorry.

Science- Love-hate situation. I love the class itself,I get the stuff and I love being with Amanda and George, but I'm out to get Mr. Platt and him likewise to me.

English- HATE IT. Oh my God I can't even begin to tell you how much I hate this class. Newhouse makes and want to puke and thats all I have to say aobut that.

Spanish- LOVE. Ms. Smith is so funny and I'm just doing good in the class..Oh and I can actually look forward to this on every day. 

History- FAVORITE. Okay, I'm usposed ot hate this class becasue Emma does, but Mrs. O'Connell is so freaking funny and George is in my class =]

Health/Gym-Hate. In gym all I have is Sammy and Jackson is a rapist, and in Health I barely have anyone and Curtis eats werestlers for breakfast and could probably toss TJ a few feet.

Geometry- hmm, I'm failing, I cant pay attention, and I forgot to count thanks to Dacey. HATE. the end.

Band- Like. I'm a geek, shut up.

Well you can thank me for wasting about 3 minutes of your life.

P.S. STOP WITH THE FREAKING CAMERAS! You know I don't like the way pictures turn out so please don't fucking try anf force me because it fucking irratates me like woah. 


Standstills are my life. Mhmm.

I've decided that there will be no more pictures. I thought'd I'd be nice and let people take them, but i looked at people's from my party and i thought i was going to throw up.

lets get a new face, or cry. whichever.

OH MY GAHD last night was so much freaking fun!! I guess people have been planning a surprise party for me for a while. I had no idea, it was so awesome. Walking into my house I was so shocked, haha I loved it! So much fun, and I love you guys so much for putting this together for me, MUAH!

Competition was today, but it was so muddy that we just did a stand still. We played really well, and the judge was even dancing so I assume we were boarderline amazing. I wish we oculs have marching but our section would have fucked it up again becuase evr though we've gone through the drill 90218091823 times, roughly, we still can't get it right. I don't get it, I work my ass off so that maybe we'll look awesome, but I keep screwing up...along with another person or two who make me want to STAB them. djhflaksjfhlaskdf. I need to stop being so weird about this.

and then there was a problem....

Today was pretty fun. Oops, it's not even half over...oh well I dont feel like doing homework.

All of the cool stuco kids went to the Walk for Breast Cancer. I hung out and walked with Paula the entire time. I LOVE THAT GIRL. She's absolutely amazing, say hi to her sometime. Ohhhh man. there was that lady from Magic..oh how I wished she would just leave, her voice got sooo annoying. I felt the need to push her off the stage. But I got over that.. Haha. Ms. Dacey is pretty funny, I never really talked to her before. Nice. Oh and there was musical entertainment..."Boyfriend" was cute, but "Mamogram" and the "Menopause Disco" were by far my favorites. Paula and I skanked it up everytime we got to a mile marker, and we were going skank to the ending ballon arch but there were so many people and thus, we had no room. Tisk. Then Paul gave Megan and I a ride home. I heart her car too.

Now I'm probably going to do homework. Probably meaning, "Oh it's only Sunday afternoon, I'll have time at night." I procrastinate. A lot. 

Bye.

If you read this, even if we do not speak often,
Comment with one memory of me.
It can be anything you want, good or bad.
Just as long as it happened.
Then post this on your livejournal to see what other people remember about you

1. I'm in love with Johnny Damon
2. Im a sickly obsessed fan of the Sox
3. I play NHL 2004 on ps2 and im FUCKING ADDICTED.
4. I love sitting on my couch and watching movies all.day.long.
5. I love the fall
6. Field Hockey is LIFE
7. I'm a Camp Marshall Kid and DAMN IM PROUD
8. Harry Potter is cool. Get over it.
9. I bought mens deodorant by accident today. 
10. I talk in my sleep
11. And if im half asleep you can probably get me to do anyhitng.
12. I love ska kids with all my heart
13. Half of the songs I love I most likely dont know the artist or even the name of them
14. Neon Orange polo wraps are tre love
15. Im wicked lazy
16. Thanks to Christina, I'm getting a real boston accent.
17. I'm a vegitarian
18. This is johnny Damon's number. YOu dont know how happy htis makes me =]
19. Im runnign out of things to say
20. My hands are freezing.

I tag- no one.

two words. Free.Agent.

What.The.Fuck.Am.I.Gonna.Do.


He's asking a lot of money for a 5 year, and I know that and I dont think he should be asking that much. But he's really good and the Sox need him. When polled, 78% of Sox fans thought getting rid of Johnny would be the best bet.

No matter where he goes, he'll always be Johnny Damon. But since 2002 I've known and loved him as a SOX PLAYER. I can't see him on another team as of now.

But if he does leave, please make sure to keep me clear of all sharp and potentially dangerous objects.

I still love you boys.

We're out of it, as a nation we have failed.

Dear Johnny, I pray to god you stay with the Sox. You are my absolute hero, and I adore and look up to you like a role model. Yeah, some call it an obsession, maybe it is. BUT I LOVE YOU.

I'm home from Nikki's house! Oh man I had so much fun!! I missed that girl so much and it was so nice to see her again. We hung out for a while, looked at CAMP SCRAPBOOKS and then went to the mall. She bought her awesomeness scarf and shirt, and MEAN GIRLS, and I bought 2 cuff bracelettes, a Green Day bracelette, and checkered toe socks =]. After the mall her mom picked us up and her brother was wearing a hamburger on his head, haha =] I love the little man kyle. We went home, and watched Mean Girls and went to beddd. Then we woke up wicked early, I didn't mind because we were going to the barn. WOO! haha. Her barn is so awesome, I wish I didn't live a million hours away. We tacked up for a bunch of kids and some other stuff. I love watching her ride, she's so amazing and I learn a lot form her to be honest. Ans then we listend to a ton of camp songssss! And now Im home. jhdlfkjsdhfljsdf. I don't want to be. And I dont want to go to school tomorrow. COOL BLONDE LOVE! Im really happyyyyyy. HAPPY BIRTHDAY ALLIE! I gotta go, but I thought i'd fil you in. Oh yeah, make that SIX! flksdfsadf

Choppy. Lovely.

Bye.

Ummm, yeah so yesterday's game= AMAZING.... even though we tied 0-0. I LOVE YOU GIRLS SO MUCH! Ahhhh I loved it. Tomorrow should hopefully be jsut as good?

and I promise I won't hit anyonw this time. 4 people is too much. Brynn, Danielle, mansfield girl, North attleboro girl. Sorry guys.

Dear Boston Red Sox, now don't get my wrong, you're my boys. BUT PLEASE pick it up a notch. I'm begging and I beleive. So please, make your hometown happy. Thank you.

Alright, the highlight of my day:

I was out with my mom at Shaws, and we were inthe check out line. I moved my arm and knocked over the bagels, so I bent down to pick them up. In the process, I banged my knee on the carrige. As I was getting up, I hit my head on the handle bar, and fell back down on my butt. 

lacking a sense of coordination? no!!

sammy51238: 143 my little vegetarian princess!!
love that girl

Today=generally okay.

1. Woke up at like, 9. SO EARLY FOR ME so I was sitting around being all nervous about field hockey.
2. Game- lost terrible. the score was only 2-0 but we all did pretty bad. Oh and I almost had a frickin asthma attack and alomost collapsed on the field. I kep calling galv and he didnt hear me for like 5 minutes and after he took me out i was sick the whole second half and alomost threw up on the ride home. Remind me to rememebr my inhalerrr.
3. Football game/marching band- relitivly fun. Saw a million people, watched us get our butss whooped. same old same ols. First performance=better thn expected. Good job guys.

I SAW SHANNON.

4. Town Spa- awesome, as usuall. I love you dave.

1. BOTH of my knees are killing me more then ever. Death to them
2. Asthma attacks=not good
3. Clarinet= broken
4. Homework- yet to be done.
5. straightening my hair never works, so i think i'll just stop trying.
6. I love him so freaking much.

Today was good, well, the secong half was.

Marching band= death trap that leads people to believe its fun to march. NOT.The band part good, the marching however, BAD. lkjashdflkasjdfh

Then Zach S, Steph, Dave, Zach W, and I went to see Cry Wolf. Good movie, recomended but not very highly. whatever.

Thennnn I came home and cleaned my room. It's comming along, I just needa new comforter and then decorate a lil bit. I mean, 2 posters and a johnny are nice but just not good enough.

Then I went over Krista's house with Christina, George and Jimmy (c's cousin) Tws amazing. We watched FEVER PiTCH and THE NOTEBOOK. I cried during both movies, I love those ones to death.

Im kind of bored and this entry really kinda sucks.

I want field hockey

I REALLY want to go to the mall.

I'm officially declaring Miss Betsy Fitsgerald my cousin. FYI.


try try try try try try try try try

it's kina hard to type that over and over again. try it i dare ya.


im so broed. I'm leaving for the movies soon though



the end.

found my skirt.

still a ton of homework.

still not gonna drive.


practice was cancelled. Kind of mad.

the end.

Sure our game was a shut out, but I'm never ever driving again. ever. And im not kidding. I did so horrible today it's sickening, and Dave was there so I made a fool out of myself. I almost nailed 3 girls in the head, 2 of which probably would have gone into a severe acoma if they hadn't moved. And on top of that, yesterday I killed brynn's ankel (while DRIVING) and today broke Jill's ball. I dont want to hurt anyone, and thats all I seem to do. No more driving. End of story. Oh and I like how I got so many thigns called on me, dont you?


And then, I get back into the locker room just to realize that I left my favorite (new, by the way) skirt in the fricking gym locker room. At this point I was in tears, I dont know why, I guess I was just really upset. 

Such a sucky day. And now I have 32039480234 hours of homework to attend to.

I'm such a freak. 

Since we lost terribly to KP all I can think about is field hockey, everything suddenly relates, and its all I wanna do. Even today, I thought it was going to be a practice from hell kind of thing, and in a way it was dont get me wrong, but I loved every minute of it. And Christine, Christina, and I were switched to back, and so far I love it. I'm not wicked bad at it so there's a future there.

I killed Brynn today. I'm sorry babe, get out of my way next time =] 

APRIL FOOLS. Just kidding brynny.

Band was..dfhlaksjfhlksjdf. It never ends. Everytime I ask Bryan the time the clock laughs at me. It's mean to me too, always tells me the time i dont want it to be, unless  ofcourse that time is time to go HOME.

To Kill a Mocking Bird should kill itself. So far its pretty good, i must say, but it also never ends. NOTHING ENDS ANYMOREEEEEE!

Im so tired, i really need sleep.

NIGHT.

Hey guess what, I realized that I can be a perfectionist. Surprising, as perfection and I are polar opposites. I can't write something (like a sotry, poem, essay) with out crossing out everything and making a bunch of arrows and moving stuff around. And yet Im still not satisfyed with any of it.

I also have a staring problem, just to let you know.

And we sucked today at field hockey today. Well, some of us tried really hard, but all and all, we sucked. Plain out killed. There are so many things that need to be worked on, practice for the next 340928374209375 weeks are going to be hell on earth. RAWR! Why can't people just listen to Galv and do what he says? And maybe try?!?! lkjhflksajhdflskhflasjdf KP!!!!kj sjdhflksdhlfajsdf

StuCo was okay, I tend to space out a lot though. Im on the College Shirt Day and BATTLE OF THE BANDS BABY! haha Im pumped.

well i gotta go, my madre wants to use this thing. computer that is.

im a sucky personnnnn

(note this is about a guy..and im a girl...hehe)
i'm a guy... who can wrestle with you and let you win.... who i can talk to about anything... who laughs at your jokes.... who puts your cold hands in my warm hoodie pockets.... who lets you use my sweatshirt for a pillow.... who says i love you & means it.... who will kiss you in the rain, in the sunshine, and in the snow.... who calls unexpectedly.... who will have many inside jokes with you and remember each one.... a guy who notices haircuts.... who realizes that you say things but dont always mean them.... who you can go swimming with on hot days.... who can tell you my problems and let you help.... who will listen to you talk... who will bring you seashells from the beach.... who will let you beat me up when you get angry.... who writes love letters to you, but doesnt send them.... who draws pictures and slips them gently into your locker slot.... who saves my genuine, big smiles for you.... with deeps eyes, that can see through faces into depths.... who wears baseball hats and lets your wear mine too. ... who gives you my t-shirt to change into and not expect to get it back.... who knows your favorite color, song, car, vegetable, perfume and the color of your toothbrush.... who will shake your dads hand and look your mom in the eye.... who will call you by your full name--first, middle and last.... who willl know when something is wrong when you're trying your best to put on an act... who will kiss you and tell you you're beautiful.... who will let you cry to me.... who will hold you & kiss your cheek.... who suprises you and compliments and plays with your hair.... who will brag about you to all of my friends... not afraid to give you a great big hug right infront of my mom... who smells like i just stepped out of the shower.... who wears cologne that you can subtly smell when you're leaning on my shoulder.... who tells you you have a nice laugh and a smile that lights up the room and simply be yours to hold.

Hey guyssss

Today wasn't too eventful, but I did a lot of things that were somewhat of the physically demanding sort, im wiped.

Woke up around 7:30 or so, for field hockey. Practice was fine up untill driving. Let's not go into that......Thennnnnn Sue picked me up and went back to the condo. We made Pizelles (sp?) for nolan's baseball thingy I hafta go to. I guess it's like a cookout slash parents v.s. kids game thingy. Whatever, either way i have to go. After that I went to help our new pastor move into the parsonage. It took 4 hours to move all the stuff into the house. I thought my arms were going to fall off, but thats okay. I got to be friends with his daughter, Candace, and she seems wicked nice. Amber, his other daughter didnt really talk much. I was kind of dissapointed because she's going to be a freshman too. Oh well i like 8th graders better anyways. His whole family is nice i guess. They're from minnesota which is cool, heck yes. Pastor Dornan isn't all bad, I used to loathe everything about him. I guess Im warming up to him. Yep. After that I went home and practiced driving the damn ball...Then  I got back to here and listened to music for 347239874293874 hours. Then my battery ran out, and so ended Green Day. 

I took a shower. Smelling of soap is a good thing.

I spend way to much timew of the computer. But it's what I do, and It's one of the few things I can do right. Wow all my entries sound like calls for attention, sorry about that, I dont mean it like that at all. Just ventisizing.


field hockey was so embarrasing. Lets not practice driving ever again. ever. kay? kay.
